postgres_password.name: PostgreSQL Password
postgres_password.description: Password for the PostgreSQL database. IMPORTANT: Change this from the default value!

nextauth_secret.name: NextAuth Secret
nextauth_secret.description: Secret key for NextAuth session security. IMPORTANT: Change this from the default value! Generate with: openssl rand -base64 32

network.1111/tcp: Blinko Web Interface (not needed if using Ingress)
